channel.title: Marie Antoinette on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Marie Antoinette on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Marc by Sofia’ Review: Sofia Coppola’s Marc Jacobs Doc Offers a Colorful but Unrevealing Insider’s Take
item.description: Premiering at Venice, the filmmaker’s first non-fiction feature surveys the career and inspirations of the designer, who is also her close friend.

item.title: ‘Marc by Sofia’ Review: Sofia Coppola’s Marc Jacobs Doc Offers a Colorful but Unrevealing Insider’s Take
item.description: Premiering at Venice, the filmmaker’s first non-fiction feature surveys the career and inspirations of the designer, who is also her close friend.

item.title: Sofia Coppola’s ’Marie Antoinette’ Costumes Were Inspired by an “Enormous Box of Macarons”
item.description: Oscar winning costume designer Milena Canonero revealed how she picked the film’s color palette during a Cartier masterclass conversation with Coppola held during the Venice Film Festival.

item.title: Sofia Coppola’s ’Marie Antoinette’ Costumes Were Inspired by an “Enormous Box of Macarons”
item.description: Oscar winning costume designer Milena Canonero revealed how she picked the film’s color palette during a Cartier masterclass conversation with Coppola held during the Venice Film Festival.
